metaDescription: Collaborate on open source software with native apps, end-to-end encryption, and extensive customization options.
sectionOneTitle:
Connect and collab on
open source software

features.title: Open Source
features.description: Inspect, modify or build on top of our open source code – Prose is completely transparent so you always know what’s going on under the hood.

features.title: Native
features.description: Enjoy dedicated native apps for MacOS, Windows and Linux. Your battery will be grateful.

features.title: End-to-end encryption
features.description: Guarantees secure communication channels, protecting your team's conversations from unauthorized access.

tabs.title: API Integrations
tabs.description: Build bots and connect to your favorite tools with an easy to use API.

tabs.title: Self-hosted
tabs.description: Hosting Prose means you control the cost and can scale more efficiently.

tabs.title: Configurable
tabs.description: Create custom features and modify the code to fit your specific requirements
